TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseIListConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Defines methods used to convert <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection members to and from instances of <xref:System.String>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class and its derivatives are intended to be used by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].

Docs.summary: Determines if a given type can be converted.

Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the result of the conversion.
Docs.exception: Occurs if value is and not a <xref:System.String>.
